availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Miner Kingsbury (Union Co, Ky, merchant and tailor)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, tailor and merchant. Native of Holland. Married to Caroline Kingsbury. Father of Caroline Kingsbury, Arabella Kingsbury, and Joseph Kingsbury. Tailor in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Union County in 1850. Merchant in Uniontown in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 507A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 554.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 345.
